name: the_lighthouse
description: - Fork the repository. - Clone your fork locally: git clone <url>. - Create a new branch for your contribution: git checkout -b my-contribution. - Make your changes and commits. Use gitmoji to add descriptive emojis to your commits reflecting their purpose. For example, use   :bug: for bug fixes, :sparkles: for new features, :pencil: for documentation updates, etc. - Push your branch to your fork: git push origin my-contribution. - Open a pull request to the main branch of the original repository.
